      • getParent

        public PatternComposite getParent()
        Returns the parent element of the component. The root component will should return null.
        Returns:
        the parent of the component

      • setSelected

        public void setSelected(boolean selected)
        Sets the selected state of the PatternComponent.
        Parameters:
        selected - the selected state

      • updateSelection

        public abstract boolean updateSelection(org.eclipse.jface.viewers.CheckboxTreeViewer treeViewer)
        Updates the checked state of the PatternComponent in the given CheckboxTreeViewer instance.
        Parameters:
        treeViewer - the CheckboxTreeViewer instance
        Returns:
        true if all children elements of the PatternComponent are checked, false otherwise

      • getFullPatternNamePrefix

        public abstract java.lang.String getFullPatternNamePrefix()

        Returns:
        the prefix of the pattern fqn
